summary: "A Song of Ice and Fire" is a popular fantasy book series by George R. R. Martin. It started with "A Game of Thrones" in 1996 and has five books so far, with two more planned. The story is set in a made-up world where different families fight for power, while a scary supernatural threat looms from the north. It's famous for its complex characters, moral questions, and unexpected plot twists. Over 90 million copies have been sold, and it's been made into a TV show and other media.
title: A Song of Ice and Fire
